channel.title: CNET UK Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: CNET UK Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Britain's best technology podcast is beamed to your auditory sensors every Friday afternoon direct from CNET UK. The honey-toned team give you everything you need to know about the week's hottest tech news, the most Crave-worthy new gadgets and answer your best questions and funniest comments. There's a special feature every week, in which we tackle a burning tech topic in more detail, and lots more fun besides. Subscribe now, and let us know what you think!
channel.itunes:author: CNET UK
channel.itunes:keywords: cnet uk, crave, mobile phones, technology, gadgets, electronics, games, apple, cent uk, carve

item.author: podcast@cnet.co.uk (CNET UK)
item.title: UK government blocks porn in Podcast 349
item.itunes:author: Luke Westaway, Andrew Hoyle, Rich Trenholm
item.itunes:subtitle: UK government blocks porn in Podcast 349
item.itunes:summary: The government wants to block online porn -- but will it work? Down with this sort of thing!

item.author: podcast@cnet.co.uk (CNET UK)
item.title: New BBC HD channels and the future of TV in Podcast 348
item.itunes:author: Jason Jenkins, Andrew Hoyle, Rich Trenholm
item.itunes:subtitle: New BBC HD channels and the future of TV in Podcast 348
item.itunes:summary: As the BBC goes HD, Netflix reinvents the TV series, and BT and Sky square off, what's the future of television -- and is Apple in it?

item.author: podcast@cnet.co.uk (CNET UK)
item.title: Hail to the app! The App Store turns 5 in Podcast 347
item.itunes:author: Luke Westaway, Andrew Hoyle, Rich Trenholm
item.itunes:subtitle: Hail to the app! The App Store turns 5 in Podcast 347
item.itunes:summary: The App Store is 5 years old, so we app-laud the best apps around -- plus the Nokia Lumia 1020 and the week's technology news.

item.author: podcast@cnet.co.uk (CNET UK)
item.title: Free stuff for your phone in Podcast 346
item.itunes:author: Luke Westaway, Andrew Hoyle, Rich Trenholm
item.itunes:subtitle: Free stuff for your phone in Podcast 346
item.itunes:summary: Bag free stuff from your phone network as we explore the world of extras, bolt-ons and Freebeez in Podcast 346.

item.author: podcast@cnet.co.uk (CNET UK)
item.title: Is the iWatch the new iPad, we ask in Podcast 345
item.itunes:author: Luke Westaway, Andrew Hoyle, Rich Trenholm
item.itunes:subtitle: Is the iWatch the new iPad, we ask in Podcast 345
item.itunes:summary: With Apple's iWatch rumoured and the Sony Xperia SmartWatch 2 unveiled this week, is the smart watch the new iPad?
